title: Smallcaps stumble but Avanti Feeds, Senco Gold, 8 others shine with weekly gains up to 22%
description: Despite a volatile week and a 0.3% decline in BSE Sensex, the BSE Smallcap index slipped just 0.15%. However, 10 smallcap stocks posted double-digit weekly gains, led by NACL Industries, Hampton Sky Realty, and Rajoo Engineers among others.
excerpt: While BSE Smallcap index closed with minor declines of 0.15% in a highly volatile week, 10 smallcap stocks finished the week with double-digit gains. The gains came despite the broader BSE Sensex closing with weekly declines of 0.3%. Here's the the full list of top smallcap winners: Smallcap Gainers
text: Apr 12, 2025, 03:39:35 PM ISTWhile BSE Smallcap index closed with minor declines of 0.15% in a highly volatile week, 10 smallcap stocks finished the week with double-digit gains. The gains came despite the broader BSE Sensex closing with weekly declines of 0.3%. Here's the the full list of top smallcap winners:NACL Industries shares finished the week with weekly gains of nearly 22%, which is highest in the pack. The stock of this agrochemical company closed at Rs 164.35 on the BSE on Friday, gaining by Rs 7.80 or 4.98%.ETMarkets.comShares of Hampton Sky Realty ended the week with gains of 17% thanks to the remarkable 20% surge on Friday. The real estate company finished ayt Rs 27.05 on the BSE, gaining by Rs 4.44 per share.ETMarkets.com5/11B.L. Kashyap and SonsB. L. Kashyap and Sons (BLK) is one of the leading Construction, Infrastructure and Civil Engineering companies in India. The stock closed with weekly gains of 16%. On Friday, the shares surged by 18% or Rs 9.08 to finish at Rs 59.46.ETMarkets.com6/11Raghav Productivity EnhancersRaghav Productivity Enhancers shares ended the week with gains of 16%. The shares of this company closed at Rs 606.75 on the BSE, rising by Rs 87.10 or 17%. The company is a manufacturer of Silica Ramming Mass.ETMarkets.com7/11Archean Chemical IndustriesShares of Archean Chemical Industries closed the week with fains of 15%. The specialty chemicals company is primarily engaged in marine chemicals and industrial salt production. The stock ended Friday's session at Rs 600.80, gaining by Rs 21.85 or 3.77%.ETMarkets.comShares of Sadhana Nitro Chem ended the week with gains of 15%. The specialty chemicals company is involved in manufacturing intermediates for dyes, pigments, and pharmaceuticals, with a focus on nitrobenzene derivatives and meta amino phenol (MAP). Its shares closed at Rs 21.29 on Friday, gaining by 2%.ETMarkets.comShares of Senco Gold jumped over 11% during the week. The company is a well-known jewellery retailer, mainly operating in Eastern India, particularly West Bengal. The counter closed at Rs 333.70 on the BSE on Friday, gaining by Rs 15.80 or 5%.ETMarkets.comShares of Avanti Feeds settled with weekly gains of 11%. On Friday, they closed at 798, gaining by 38.75 or 5.10%. Avanti Feeds is a leading player in shrimp feed manufacturing and also engages in shrimp processing and exports.ETMarkets.comShares of Jyothy Labs ended the week with gains of over 10%. They fell 4% on Friday to settle at Rs 364.50. Jyothy Labs is a consumer goods company known for products in the fabric care, dishwashing, personal care, and mosquito repellent segments.ETMarkets.com
html:
Apr 12, 2025, 03:39:35 PM IST

While BSE Smallcap index closed with minor declines of 0.15% in a highly volatile week, 10 smallcap stocks finished the week with double-digit gains. The gains came despite the broader BSE Sensex closing with weekly declines of 0.3%. Here's the the full list of top smallcap winners:

NACL Industries shares finished the week with weekly gains of nearly 22%, which is highest in the pack. The stock of this agrochemical company closed at Rs 164.35 on the BSE on Friday, gaining by Rs 7.80 or 4.98%.

ETMarkets.com

Shares of Hampton Sky Realty ended the week with gains of 17% thanks to the remarkable 20% surge on Friday. The real estate company finished ayt Rs 27.05 on the BSE, gaining by Rs 4.44 per share.

ETMarkets.com

5/11

B.L. Kashyap and Sons

B. L. Kashyap and Sons (BLK) is one of the leading Construction, Infrastructure and Civil Engineering companies in India. The stock closed with weekly gains of 16%. On Friday, the shares surged by 18% or Rs 9.08 to finish at Rs 59.46.

ETMarkets.com

6/11

Raghav Productivity Enhancers

Raghav Productivity Enhancers shares ended the week with gains of 16%. The shares of this company closed at Rs 606.75 on the BSE, rising by Rs 87.10 or 17%. The company is a manufacturer of Silica Ramming Mass.

ETMarkets.com

7/11

Archean Chemical Industries

Shares of Archean Chemical Industries closed the week with fains of 15%. The specialty chemicals company is primarily engaged in marine chemicals and industrial salt production. The stock ended Friday's session at Rs 600.80, gaining by Rs 21.85 or 3.77%.

ETMarkets.com

Shares of Sadhana Nitro Chem ended the week with gains of 15%. The specialty chemicals company is involved in manufacturing intermediates for dyes, pigments, and pharmaceuticals, with a focus on nitrobenzene derivatives and meta amino phenol (MAP). Its shares closed at Rs 21.29 on Friday, gaining by 2%.

ETMarkets.com

Shares of Senco Gold jumped over 11% during the week. The company is a well-known jewellery retailer, mainly operating in Eastern India, particularly West Bengal. The counter closed at Rs 333.70 on the BSE on Friday, gaining by Rs 15.80 or 5%.

ETMarkets.com

Shares of Avanti Feeds settled with weekly gains of 11%. On Friday, they closed at 798, gaining by 38.75 or 5.10%. Avanti Feeds is a leading player in shrimp feed manufacturing and also engages in shrimp processing and exports.

ETMarkets.com

Shares of Jyothy Labs ended the week with gains of over 10%. They fell 4% on Friday to settle at Rs 364.50. Jyothy Labs is a consumer goods company known for products in the fabric care, dishwashing, personal care, and mosquito repellent segments.

ETMarkets.com
